page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT IN LLANBRYNMAIR
page.content: Most people in our area work on farms. Many people work in Laura Ashley as secretaries or machinists.In Laura Ashley they make dresses and skirts. Some people work in Newtown in offices and others work as teachers.Some people work in Machynlleth in banks or in shops and cafes.Most people have got cars to travel to work because their place of employment is far.Some people work in their own businesses and employ a few others .Some people work in the forestries planting trees and cutting them down.There are many forestry plantations near our area.Some men work in garages repairing cars and also selling petrol.Some men and women work in the bakery baking bread and cakes which is near to our area at Talerddig.
